channel.title: Spell casting on npcs
channel.description: how do I enable spell casting? like one click at a time on NPCS? (NOT autocasting)

item.title: Spell casting on npcs
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

Guess you better start then

Read full topic

item.title: Spell casting on npcs
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:4, topic:444237”][quote author=Code kai link=topic=546929.msg4009573#msg4009573 date=1339022525]
I do that, then click the NPC, but it doesn’t work (Only on players for some reason)

Autocasting work perfectly on both players and NPCs
[/quote]Looks like your server doesn’t have magic on npc’s. You’ll have to write it yourself or find a tutorial. If you can’t do that then the option of leeching the shit out of someone elses’ server is always there, which is highly frowned upon, and will get you nowhere in life…[/quote]

I hate leeching, rather code from scratch.

Read full topic

If you can’t do that then the option of leeching the shit out of someone elses’ server is always there, which is highly frowned upon, and will get you nowhere in life…
